mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.note_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.content, c.likes, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id ORDER BY c.id DESC

SELECT c.id, c.note_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.content, c.likes, c.created_at, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.note_id = #{noteId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT c.id, c.note_id, c.user_id, c.parent_id, c.content, c.likes, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM comments c LEFT JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (note_id, user_id, parent_id, content, likes, created_at) VALUES (#{noteId}, #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{content}, #{likes}, NOW())
